name: DS Dengeki Bunko: Iria no Sora, UFO no Natsu
name_original: DS Dengeki Bunko: Iria no Sora, UFO no Natsu
description:
DS Dengeki Bunko: Iria no Sora, UFO no Natsu is an adventure game developed by Medis Media. It was originally released in 2007. Medis Media published the game.
DS Dengeki Bunko: Iria no Sora, UFO no Natsu is available on Nintendo DS.
